headline: Bold Flash Art &
Custom Designs
hero.subheadline: Professional tattoo artistry with a focus on vibrant flash designs and personalized custom work
hero.imageAlt: Flash By AJ Tattoo studio hero image

portfolio.subtitle: A collection of bold flash designs and custom pieces

sessions.subtitle: Choose the perfect session for your next tattoo
sessions.guarantee: All sessions include aftercare kit and follow-up consultation

testimonials.quote: AJ's flash work is incredible - bold, clean lines and amazing colour saturation. Exactly what I was looking for!
testimonials.author: Sarah M.

testimonials.quote: The custom piece AJ designed for me exceeded all expectations. Professional, creative, and such attention to detail.
testimonials.author: Mike T.

paragraphs: With over 8 years in the tattoo industry, AJ has developed a distinctive style that combines classic flash art with modern techniques. Specializing in bold, vibrant designs that stand the test of time.

From traditional flash pieces to completely custom artwork, AJ works closely with each client to bring their vision to life. Every tattoo is approached with meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to excellence.
about.callout: Every piece tells a story - let's create yours together.
about.imageAlt: AJ, tattoo artist at Flash By AJ Tattoo

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: Flash designs can often be booked within the same week, while custom pieces typically require 2-3 weeks lead time for design and scheduling.

items.question: What's included in the session price?
items.answer: All sessions include the tattoo work, aftercare kit, detailed aftercare instructions, and a follow-up consultation to ensure proper healing.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Next Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your session today and join hundreds of satisfied clients

booking.modalDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thank you for your booking request. We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment details.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment
